extendedInfo.description: Do you think you know all flags of countries? You should try our new app. Guess The Country!Test yourself on one of the best and most large collection of flags.Guess The Country  is simply one of best world flags puzzle app with online scoreboard!Guess The Country:-Learn flags of world countries with this fun game.-Learn and train your memory and brain in this educational and fun game where flags are displayed and one at a time, you have just guess the country national flags-Memorizing countries flags is good for the education of children.-Suitable for all ages.-No ads.-Free app.
